metadata.title: USN-4447-1 -- libssh vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libssh incorrectly handled certain requests. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4447-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libssh-gcrypt-dev - 0.6.3-4.3ubuntu0.6 libssh-doc - 0.6.3-4.3ubuntu0.6 libssh-dev - 0.6.3-4.3ubuntu0.6 libssh-4 - 0.6.3-4.3ubuntu0.6 libssh-gcrypt-4 - 0.6.3-4.3ubuntu0.6 No subscription required
